homepage.subtitle: Discover how sounds are made, mix sound waves, and have fun with music.

playground.title: Wave Playground
playground.description: Explore different sound waves! Choose a wave type, adjust the frequency and volume, then press play to hear the sound!

mixer.title: Wave Mixer
mixer.description: Mix up multiple sound waves! Toggle oscillators on and off and discover how the waves blend together!

sequencer.title: Sequencer
sequencer.description: Create your own music! Add sequences, color boxes with the notes you want to play, and press play to hear the rhythm! You can also listen to preset examples.

about.title: About Sound Lab
about.description: Sound Lab is a fun and interactive way to learn about sound waves, music, and audio synthesis. Explore different waveforms, create your own sequences, and mix sounds together. Perfect for music enthusiasts and curious minds!
about.contact_info: Sound Lab is an open-source project. For feedback, suggestions, or to contribute, please open an issue or pull request on
